thread.title: Robert Wigley
thread.title_full: Solar Market reviewed by Robert Wigley

author: Robert Wigley
title: Robert Wigley
text:
Robert here,
Again - It was nice talking to you.
Remember when I was
A kid my old man (80)
Now yrs that is. Made this contraption, which looking quite Scientific!
You know I was too young to know too much back then.
I watched him errect this strange contraption
On top of the House roof.
And would you believe it.
It sure worked long an short of it!..
Not too much to it !
Sincerely,
Robert WIGLEY.
